channel.title: Ad Nauseam - 319 Revision (Remake of an Oldschool Server)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/Untitled-1-7_zps9c24d4a1.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Developers:[/b][/center]
[ul][li]RiiPiiNFTW[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[center][b]Purpose:[/b] The purpose of this server is to recreate an oldschool 2009 RSPS I used to play. The server was mainly a PK server. Max levels were 120 and it took a decent amount of time to level that fast. Max combat level was 180 as well which took a LOOOOOOOONG time to get. You'd level your levels by clicking hay bales, targets, dummies, etc. It was also a spawn server, but you were only able to spawn 1 thing at a time, no amounts.[/center]
[center][b]Media of Current Progress:[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/3qaoF.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3qapa.jpg[/img]
[b]Media of the server I'm trying to recreate:[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RL5it93i6S0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=urqsuqAu-Us
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BffkMOuL7Bw
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lMRlp6cDLI4
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nd7uRWfZDpc
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FX8gnbJZjL8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-lxAsNvBDKk
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XJFVgCgQTA
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cXEiQ6i2_ZM
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jAp4-rez_14[/center]
[center][b]Whats left for you?[/b] I am currently looking for two more people to help me finish this. The base is a custom NIO Framework, and the client base is the original MITB Refactored client with a 319 cache. I am not really one for applications, so just post below letting me know that you're interested. This is more of a learning project for me than anything else, and will most likely be released after its finished.[/center]

@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Developers:[/center]

[ul][li]RiiPiiNFTW[/li]
[li][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

[center]Purpose:
The purpose of this server is to recreate an oldschool 2009 RSPS I used to play. The server was mainly a PK server. Max levels were 120 and it took a decent amount of time to level that fast. Max combat level was 180 as well which took a LOOOOOOOONG time to get. You’d level your levels by clicking hay bales, targets, dummies, etc. It was also a spawn server, but you were only able to spawn 1 thing at a time, no amounts.[/center]

[center]Media of Current Progress:

Media of the server I’m trying to recreate:

[center]Whats left for you?
I am currently looking for two more people to help me finish this. The base is a custom NIO Framework, and the client base is the original MITB Refactored client with a 319 cache. I am not really one for applications, so just post below letting me know that you’re interested. This is more of a learning project for me than anything else, and will most likely be released after its finished.[/center]
